name: Snow Boarder
description:
Snow Boarder.

Hello, this is the second project on a course am working on, I decided to upload it here since you might like it. 

What is it about: This game is about trying to reach the end as fast as possible, feel free to share your score in my discord (link at the end) or in the comments, am also probably going to revisit this game, and add a flip counter, and a a main menu, along with other fun stuff.

Controls

  • Rotate Left: A
  • Rotate Right: D
  • Go quicker: Space

Links, and Projects

Remember you can support me by donating, even 1$ helps a ton, anyways thanks for checking this out and I hope you enjoy it.

Discord: https://discord.gg/qZXZcz8H
